Review is and will be long. Continuous update from newest to oldest.

March 31, 2021 review: Hexes have been "updated" to new locations at some update when I wasn't playing. However, because they don't spawn dynamically survivors have memorized their locations and almost immediately break any hex totem you may be using in the match. They've added many more killers, but you have to either grind iridescent shards to buy each character (9k shards per) or buy the DLC's. Buying DLC's doesn't bother me, but DLC's + base game comes out to $170-ish. Then they're selling cosmetics (auric cell packs you buy) or you can grind the upwards of 20k+ per outfit. THEN they're charging for a season pass. I guess when your player base is constantly dwindling that you have to milk what's left.

They have added many more second chance perks to survivors so that if they get caught, then they or another survivor can take an action to give that player a second chance if they're caught again. That's on top of all the pallets and windows they still have to loop. There are many infinite loops still in the game and Haddonfield is still so broken for survivors most of the time it's not worth playing. Many big name streamers have afk'd that map.

They finally nerfed Decisive Strike after nearly 5 years. For comparison, it only took 4 months to nerf Hex: Undying which actually made Hex perks worth using as the hex would just hop to the next totem. Speaking of totems, they still spawn out in the wide open by trees or objects with zero coverage on them. I have recent screenshots on my profile.

Their matchmaking system is beyond obnoxious. Because red ranks cried so much because of their lobby wait time they basically removed similar rank matchmaking. Now it doesn't matter what your rank is, you could probably end up with a red rank. I personally do not like playing against red ranks and I have deranked out of red ranks so I get less of them. If you hit red ranks, you'll pretty much only play against red ranks. However, they're supposedly going to implement a per killer ranking so that you will be matched with similar ranked players based off how well you play that killer. I'm fairly certain this will once again raise red rank queue times and they'll bitch because there aren't enough killers to play all the red rank survivor mains. We'll see how long it takes before BHVR caves and goes back to letting red ranks play with anyone outside their rank where they'll steamroll the killer. 

Red ranks are some of the most obnoxious and toxic players in the game. Most have thousands of hours of playtime so now they can only get entertainment and enjoyment out of DbD by taunting and bullying killers who clearly aren't on their level as they wouldn't be able to do that to fellow red rank killers. Realizing this was going to be the norm in red ranks I deranked into purple in an attempt to get less of them. I do, but every now and then there's a trio of whole SWF group that play like they're playing for a tournament grand prize. If you enjoy playing the game like it's a job or being toxic to other players, then red ranks is probably what you want to strive for. Otherwise you should try and hover around purple ranks where people actually play in the spirit of the game and it's enjoyable.

Also, cheaters are back. There are plenty of videos on the DbD subreddit of killers flying about the map and forcing character animations on themselves and the survivors as they freely wish.

October 12, 2019 review: Lots of changes to the game, but pallet looping and structure looping are still an issue. SWF are still fairly broken and annoying, but it's not so unbalanced as it once was against Killer. Anti-cheat was implemented at some point after I quit playing so I haven't run into cheaters since starting to play again in the last week. Overall, vast improvements. I will say that adding so many 1 shot downs for killers is obnoxious and was a huge step in the wrong direction.

December 16 review: The game has been updated and balanced a bit, but the devs are once again moving in the wrong direction. The game is heavily balanced towards survivors. I have swapped to playing a survivor and being a fairly poor survivor player, I can more often than not outplay the killer easily. Pallet looping, infinite looping around structural "walls", and looping through windows to palllets and structural "walls" allows for a survivor to kite indefinitely.

I freely admit that I'm a fairly poor survivor and even I can farm points against killers. SWF lobbies allow you to gang up on a killer to prevent him from hooking, downing, or killing any survivors.

They updated generators so that they all complete once the 5th generator is done, but they also decided for whatever reason to put a fire under the stark white skull totems that already stand out against the drab browns, greens, and grays of the map. Using any hex perk is completely useless at the moment until they fix how totems function, whether they hide them better or make them harder to spot overall.

The one positive that has happened with the latest update is that bot killers seem to be far fewer, though they didn't even mention an EAC update in their patch notes that I saw.


November 23rd review: Can not recommend this game until the devs do something about the completely unbalanced match making and the hackers who are all rank 1 with ultra rare perks. Most of my time played is from playing with friends due to how fucking shit the multiplayer was  at letting you get games. Now I have to deal with this shit and I have too much time played in private matches to be able to get a refund or I'd refund this trash until it's worth buying on sale in the future.

DBD is such an amazing and atmospheric hide and go seek game with horror twists. Everything you expect from every horror movie can be relived here, to the fails and jumpscares to the decision of yours and other people's lives. I highly recommend you get this game if youre into that and also because of the devs. They have a short team (about 30 ppl) who constantly give all their attention to the steam forums and reddit posts to making this game balanced and fair while also taking in questions and suggestions from the actual fans. These devs won't abandon this game any time soon, you can tell by the updates and the twitch streams. I feel like the fans and the devs have such a huge bond between them, enough to make them win 2 awards recently, so i feel that that also makes a huge contribution to the game as well.

I got every DLC as my donation and support to the devs and creators and the team, wp

Dead by Daylight ist das typische Fang & Versteck Spiel. Es macht auch trotz seines Nebeneffekts als Lobbysimulator sehr viel Spaß.

Nachtrag 08/2020: Mitlerweile sollte man es eher Dead by Buglight nennen. Seit Monaten kriegen sie den Rank-Error nicht gefixt und zusätzlich haben die Entwickler nun auch einen Sync-Error mit eingebaut, wo man keine Blutpunkte bekommt und kriegen dies anscheinend auch nicht gefixt, im Moment kann und will ich dieses Spiel nicht weiterempfehlen.
挺好的，不错！

Ich kann dieses Spiel nur empfehlen. Natürlich ist es nicht Bugfrei und an einigen Stellen (Gerade beim Balancing) manschmal unfair. Aber es macht trotzdem (oder gerade deshalb?) unglaublich Spaß. Egal ob als Killer oder Überlebender, allein oder mit Freunden, die Atmosphäre und das Spielprinzip können über Stunden fesseln. Aber auch eine schnelle Runde zwischendurch ist spaßig. Nur an den Lobbys bzw. dem Matchfinding und der Kartenauswahl müsste dringend gearbeitet werden.

Dead by Daylight is a pretty fun horror game. It has interesting lore behind it, though there isn't much, and the gameplay is simple but intense. In Dead by Daylight, one takes the role of either the survivor or the killer in a 4 survivors vs. 1 killer situation. The survivors must active 5 generators in order to power the exit gates and escape, while the killer hunts down the survivors and tries to put them on hooks to sacrifice them to the Entity. This leads to intense, thrilling moments of running, trying to escape the killer, and hiding when the killer gets close. Although survivors can be lone wolves, it is highly recommended that the four survivors work together, because every action they do together gets accomplished faster, and each survivor earns more "bloodpoints," the main currency of the game when leveling up your character.

[h1]Pros:[/h1]
-Intense Gameplay.
-Nice art style.
-Great atmosphere.
-Large variety of killers/survivors with their own set of perks.

[h1]Cons:[/h1]
-Small learning curve.
-Killer is a bit tricky to learn.
-Some bugs, but they're not necessarily game breaking.
-Some perks can make the game unbalanced at times.

Overall, I recommend giving this game a try, especially if it's on sale. If I were to rate it, I would probably give it an 9/10.

简而言之，这是我第一款steam上运行的游戏。杀机以后，我不再吸毒不再打撸不再炉石，尽管这个游戏有各种各样的BUG，三天两头进不去游戏，但是我相信会越来越好，因为可玩性非常高，新手玩家还是建议玩人类，前期会被虐，可以多看看直播，或者找人开黑，总之玩这个游戏不能慌。冷静应对，最后逃出生天是特别痛快的事情。

It's not balanced and it has a good amount of clunk.  They FINALLY made it so your survive with friends groups actually persist between games (you had to reform after every game and it was annoying) and they added cross platform play which is pretty huge for an online only game.  Honestly there are a few other horror asymmetrical games out there but this one is the best, has the most content, and is still being supported.  I have gone back and forth on the game a lot but I also have 700 hours in.  Is it worth it.  Yeah if asymmetrical multiplayer games are your thing the positives out weight the negatives in my opinion.

揣着不到三百个小时的游戏时长
      来翻一翻黎明杀机这款游戏的优劣吧！
不错，作为一款恐怖游戏来说，杀机不是最好的
但是，它蕴含着自己独特的魅力和体验
我们并不能因为他有bug、不会玩求生者、或者不会玩屠夫来评论这款游戏的好与坏！
它独特的游戏体验和容易让人上瘾的刺激感都让人很痴迷
既然作为可以评论的观点
那我们就来客观的说一说游戏的优与差
  
     以下为个人观点，您可以不喜欢，可以反驳，可以留言，但是请尊重他人，勿喷
游戏独特的体验感、刺激感、是作为恐怖游戏不可或缺的，很多人都沉浸在作为求生者被屠夫追逐时荷尔蒙上升的感觉，游戏bgm会根据不同的屠夫，地图有所改变，尤其是一个人在深夜玩的时候，遇到杀人鬼撞脸的一类的时候，非常的刺激。
独特的游戏模式，会让你在偷电、追杀与被追杀的时候不会觉得无聊（ 你行你遛屠夫，我怂我修发电机）
和好友一起开黑的时候一边交流一边享受游戏打发时间是极好的选择

虽然游戏很棒，但是不能说他完美，因为他真的存在很多bug
凭良心说，上百小时的玩家，谁没有被板子卡到地下去？那个屠夫没有被板子砸到以后卡在板子上？粉色齿轮白工具箱（耐久不多时）无法直接修好发电机，卡在屠夫肩膀，或者被屠夫一刀砍倒后一头扎在树里，新改的血网加技能2选1，有时候1个都点不到就被吃了。。
技能数十种，有用的总就那么一些保命技能，其他的基本上没有太大作为，直接进入冷宫一蹶不振

虽然游戏bug很多，对于人类或者屠夫从某某点有些不公平
但是绝不会影响我对于杀机的喜爱和热衷

以下对于想入手的朋友发表建议
这是一款团队类型游戏，除非你想怂着一个人溜走遭别人的唾弃(能救该救人的时候不要犹豫，加分很高的)，所以请在关键时刻帮助你的队友！
首先不建议新手在国服玩，虽然国服会玩的人很多，救人的人也不少
但是总有那么一些自私的人会被你频繁的碰到，他们只修自己的发电机，从来不管队友的死活，就算你把他救了，当你有危险的时候他们会躲在一旁，绝不帮你！
如果你想体验人性，换到美服，开一个游戏加速器一类的东西，去试一试，虽然外F也有很多不救人的人，但是你玩多了，就自然明白比例了（可能本人丧）
总的来说还是很好玩的，虽然并不像官方说的那么恐怖，不过是消磨时间的好帮手（心脏病高血压人等慎入）目前游戏里bug还是有点多，希望官方能尽快解决吧~

Took over my sleeping schedule. Great to play with friends or by yourself. Play as survivors who are just trying to leave the nightmare OR make the killer dodge. Or play as the killer and let loose all the rage from your life on virtual survivors who might try to break your ankles from all the juking. Dead By Daylight has almost all your favorite killers from the movies and builds up tension and suspense if you are actually going to make it to that pallet or window in time. Not sure what I mean by that? Play a couple games and you will understand what I mean. BIG THUMBS UP make sure to not miss out on this great game!
